entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
